info.name: Global Miles E-commerce API
info.description: API for E-commerce Partners. This document includes Cart, Discount, Payment, Order and Return related endpoints provided by Global Miles.

request.description:
This endpoint allows to get list of orders. In order to get detailed order history and reconciliation you can use this endpoint.

You can try this API with configuring client parameters in Console Tab below. Test OAuthClientId is b30359c21700fd6f2b91154adcb7b37bab3e7e0a33e22682e5dd149d7a6ac4df and OAuthClientSecret is 4bc4335faad41d6a23cd059e495005f00496a64e34e6187b1d72695a8debd28c

response.status: Bad Request	- The request was unacceptable, often due to missing a required parameter.
response.name: Response_400

response.status: Unauthorized - No valid API key provided.
response.name: Response_401

response.status: Request Failed - The parameters were valid but the request failed.
response.name: Response_402

response.status: Not Found - The requested resource doesn't exist.
response.name: Response_404

response.status: Too Many Requests - Too many requests hit the API too quickly.
response.name: Response_429

response.status: Server Error - Something went wrong.
response.name: Response_500

request.description:

request.description:
An access token will allow you to make requests for the system. We support only one type of token: client_credentials.

request.description:
After successful authentication and retrieving needed token, this endpoint allows to start a payment transaction. To be able to complete whole payment process successfully also check "Complete Mile Payment endpoint" please.
